alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:11PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, Bergen, Westchester, southeastern Orange, western Putnam, Bronx, Rockland and New York (Manhattan) Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Greenwood Lake to Fort Lee. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yonkers, White Plains, Hackensack, New City, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ossining, Ridgewood, Peekskill, Monsey, Nanuet, Ramsey, Ringwood, Haverstraw and Tarrytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Southern Westchester
